msgSnippet: I d like to see a feature that would monitor when it has been more than 10 minutes since I ran/passed the tests.  Maybe it can be incorporated into the GUI

I'd like to see a feature that would monitor when it has been more than
10 minutes since I ran/passed the tests.  Maybe it can be incorporated
into the GUI Runner, or maybe it should be an "independent daemon".  I'm
still trying to learn the 10 minute-cycle, but I can see a warning that
you haven't run the test in 8 minutes (giving you 2 minutes) to fix your
test and run it.  Who knows.  Seems like a lot of possible ways to
configure things.
-- 
David Corbin 		
Mach Turtle Technologies, Inc.
http://www.machturtle.com

subject: Tick tick tick
